thread.title: Tunisia: Budget of Presidency of Republic Cut By 700 Thousand Dinars
thread.title_full: Tunisia: Budget of Presidency of Republic Cut By 700 Thousand Dinars

title: Tunisia: Budget of Presidency of Republic Cut By 700 Thousand Dinars
text:
Tunisia: UK Police Confirm Links Between Sousse and Bardo Attacks 
As for the security and military institutions, the budget of the Interior Ministry has increased from 2 million 615.7 thousand dinars to 2 million 691.3 thousand dinars, while that of the Ministry of National Defence went up from one million 792.2 thousand dinars to one million 921.3 thousand dinars. 
With regard to constitutional bodies, one million dinars has been allocated to the Supreme Judicial Council (French: CSM), 11.5 million to the Truth and Dignity Commission (French: IVD) and 28 million to the Independent High Elections Authority (French: ISIE). 
The state budget was cut by 1.1 billion dinars, i.e. a budget of 27.7 billion dinars under the supplementary finance bill 2015 against 29 billion dinars. Tunisia
